Name: Big Bears Bad Advice
About the game: Do you wish to know your inevitable future? Perhaps if you stub your toe tomorrow to be exact? Well then Big Bears Bad Advice is for you! (Caution: May only be accurate 1/9th of the time) Big bear knows all! Big bear knows most... perhaps less than he lets on with his subversive list of somewhat plausable predictions. Check back in with Bear once per day for another 'unique' prediction from a current roster of 24. Techincal Information: ---------------------- Big Bears Bad Advice is designed to be used once per day as a great desktop companion more than an actual repeat software and is also fully resizable to the users liking. Experience 24 full, strange and downright eerie predictions. More updates are planned to boost the prediction roster alongside more in-depth mechanics.
